title: Noam Chomsky on prospects of resolving the Israeli-Palestinian conflict
description:
The lecture by Prof. Noam Chomsky on the prospects for resolving the Israeli-Palestinian conflict was organized at United Nations Headquarters in New York on 14 October 2014 by the UN Palestinian Rights Committee, within the framework of the International Year of Solidarity with the Palestinian People. The lecture was followed by a Q&A session with Prof. Chomsky moderated by broadcast journalist Amy Goodman of Democracy Now! 

Further information: https://www.un.org/unispal/document/auto-insert-192921/
https://www.un.org/unispal/document/auto-insert-182581/
